meanings.definition: stupefiers: substances that cause someone to become unable to think clearly or be aware of what is happening
meanings.sent1: The powerful stupefiers in the medicine made him feel drowsy and confused.
meanings.sent2: The stupefiers in the drink left her in a state of confusion.
meanings.sent3: The stupefiers in the sleeping pill worked so well that he woke up thinking he was on Mars!
meanings.sent4: The stupefiers of exhaustion clouded his mind like a thick fog.
meanings.sent5: The stupefiers of the anesthesia made the surgery seem like a dream.

meanings.definition: stupefiers: things that make someone feel very surprised or shocked
meanings.sent1: The unexpected news was a stupefier that left everyone in the room speechless.
meanings.sent2: The sudden appearance of a unicorn was a stupefier to the children at the party.
meanings.sent3: The magician's disappearing act was a stupefier that had the audience gasping in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The stupefiers of the plot twist in the movie had the viewers on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected arrival of aliens was a stupefier that changed the course of history.
